name: multi-agent-orchestration
description: Manage workflows where multiple agents collaborate on tasks. Define sequential, parallel, or conditional workflows with dependency tracking and simulated execution.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: multi_agent_orchestration
toolDefinition.description: Manage multi-agent workflows. Create sequential, parallel, or conditional workflows, add/remove steps with dependency tracking, simulate execution, and monitor status.

action.description: create_workflow (new workflow), add_step (add step to workflow), remove_step (remove step), execute_workflow (simulate execution), get_status (workflow info), list_workflows (list all), cancel_workflow (delete workflow)

step.description: Step definition: { name, agentType, task, dependsOn?, condition? }

agentType.description: Type of agent for this step

dependsOn.description: Names of steps this step depends on

stepName.description: Name of the step to remove
